```javascript
var session = require('express-session');

app.use(session(options));
```

- options
    - cookie
        - cookie.expires
        - cookie.httpOnly
        - cookie.maxAge
        - cookie.path
        - cookie.sameSite
        - cookie.secure
    - genid
    - name
    - proxy
    - resave
    - rolling
    - saveUninitialized
    - secret
    - store
    - unset
